titleStmt.title: A speach deliuered, to the Kings most excellent Maiestie in the name of the sheriffes of London and Middlesex. By Maister Richard Martin of the Middle Temple
titleStmt.author: Martin, Richard, 1570-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by R. Read] for Thomas Thorppe, and are to be sould by William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Maister Martins speach to the Kings Maiestie.
The first leaf and the last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
